file_content.text: Thus is our path cleared, Captain. The seals withholding the inner core are removed. The operation can proceed.
Couldn't have done it without you, Yuun. Time to contact Vik.
My favorite part is about to start. Better call Vik.
That took too long. Hopefully Vik can carry out his part faster.
We need to pick up the pace.
Vik, come in. The seals are disabled--rendezvous at the core access door ASAP, over.
That ugly bug got you through after all, huh? Heading for the door. Vik out.
Hmm. Yes, this is one of the points we seek. The first key to the door that seals our great objective.
The signs within this terminal's workings are clear to Yuun, Captain. Several others yet remain--all must be disabled for access to the core section.
Let's move out and find the rest.
We need to get this done quick--can't you find another way to bypass the security seals?
Yuun apologizes, sir, but no other way has been revealed. The best path seems to be the one before us.
Let us proceed, sir. Our destination is well within reach.
